channel.title: Rioja on Decanted
channel.description: Recent content in Rioja on Decanted

item.title: Ibericos Riojoa
item.description: I loved this wine. Would go great with some salty snacks, or cured meats. Tasting Notes Dark ruby in color Black cherry, vegetal aromas Oaky vanilla secondary aromas and taste Some spice/peppery notes Medium tannin that come on strong at the back of the tongue I got a little bit of green flower, like dandelion in the finish
